entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
